English: Strikes the enemy two times, in rapid succession.

Polish: Tnie przeciwnika wielokrotnie, poprzez wirowanie wokół własnej osi.
Cios kończący kombinację, wymierzony z taką siłą, że czasem ogłusza wroga.

English: Increases the defense of a Shield against melee attacks & significantly increases Ranged Block.
Polish: Zwiększa wartość obrony twojej Tarczy i szansę na zablokowanie ataku z dystansu.
Zwiększa szansę na zablokowanie ataków z dystansu.

English: Increases Accuracy and increases power of the Sword.
Polish: Zwiększa celność i siłę ataku Mieczy.

English: Increases Accuracy and increases power of the Axe.
Polish: Zwiększa celność i siłę ataku Toporów.

English: Uses the element of a weapon to boost your attack power.
Polish: Zwiększa siłę ataku, wykorzystując żywioł zawarty w twojej broni. (Broń musi posiadać żywioł.)

English: Increases the striking power of a Sword.
Increases the striking power of an axe.
A single, powerful strike that attacks all enemies around you.
Polish: Potężny atak który zadaje obrażenia wszystkim zebranym przeciwnikom od frontu.
Atakuje przeciwnika na dystans ognistą falą energii.
Unieruchamia przeciwnika za pomocą rzuconej sieci.

English: This skill absorbs one attack and releases back at an enemy.
Polish: Absorbuje atak przeciwnika i zwraca go ze zwiększoną siłą.

English: Decreases all incoming damage from enemies by sacrificing attack power. Requires a weapon to be equipped.
Polish: Masywnie zwiększa twoją obronę kosztem obniżenia siły ataku. Wymaga broni.

English: Reflects a part of the damage received by an enemy.
Polish: Pasywnie zadaje atakującym wrogom część zadanych przez nich obrażeń.

English: Increases striking power. Become more vulnerable to all incoming attacks.
Polish: Zwiększa siłę ataku kosztem obniżenia własnej obrony.

English: To strike a blow at the enemy by flourishing a weapon. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Polish: Odrzuca wrogów przed tobą za pomocą potężnego zamachu. Wymaga dwuręcznej broni.

English: Powerful, downward strike. Has a chance to reduce Incoming Healing on target. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Polish: Rozrywający cios, posiadający szansę na zmniejszenie leczenie u wroga. Wymaga broni dwuręcznej.

English: Powerful, upward strike. Stuns the enemy. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Polish: Szarżuje wroga i ogłusza go. Wymaga broni dwuręcznej.

English: Powerful, downward strike. Lowers the defense of the target. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Polish: Potwornie bolesny cios, obniżający siłę obrony celu. Wymaga dwuręcznej broni.

English: Pounds the ground, stunning nearby enemies. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Polish: Uderza ziemię z olbrzymią siłą, wywołującą ogłuszenie u wrogów wokół ciebie. Wymaga dwuręcznej broni.
Tnie przeciwnika na krzyż za pomocą dwóch broni.

English: Strikes at the enemy and lowers their Block Rate.
Polish: Przebija pancerz wroga, obniżając jego szansę na Blok.

English: Pounces on the enemy from afar. Stuns the target. Requires two weapons.
Polish: Przebija przeciwnika szybkim ślizgiem. Mała szansa na ogłuszenie. Wymaga dwóch broni.

English: Rapidly strikes the blades at multiple enemies. Requires two weapons.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie. Wymaga dwóch broni.

English: Strikes at an enemy multiple times. Each hit has a chance to deal double damage. Requires two weapons.
Polish: Uderza wielokrotnie przeciwnika za pomocą specjalnej kombinacji ciosów. Wymaga dwóch broni.

English: Powerful, downward strike. Lowers targets accuracy. Requires two weapons.
Polish: Potężny cios znad głowy, który może obniżać celność wroga. Wymaga dwóch broni.

English: Powerful, slashing attack. Attacks all enemies around. Requires two weapons.
Polish: Potężne cięcie, przebijające wszystkich wrogów zebranych przed tobą. Wymaga dwóch broni.

English: Increases attack speed and striking power, and reduces skill damage.
Polish: Wpadasz w szał by zwiększyć szybkość i siłę ataku. Ten stan powoduje redukcję obrażeń od umiejętności.

English: Recover the HP of a target.

Polish: Wskrzesza martwego gracza. Wskrzeszony gracz traci mniej punktów doświadczenia.

English: Increases maximum HP of the target.
Recovers your own HP when it reaches below a certain point.
Polish: Jeśli twoje HP spadną poniżej pewnego limitu, otrzymasz jednorazową dawkę leczenia.

English: Heals party members close to you.
Polish: Leczy wszystkich członków drużyny wokół ciebie.

English: Increases striking power of a target.
Polish: Zwiększa striking power of a target.

English: Pounds the ground and damages enemies around you.
Polish: Uderza ziemię z olbrzymią siłę, zadając obrażenia wszystkim celom wokół ciebie.

English: All attacks gain the chance to stun.
Polish: Wszystkie twoje ataki zyskują szansę na ogłuszenie.

English: Increases the walk speed of a target.
Increases the block rate of a target.
Increases the accuracy of a target.
Increases attack speed and decreases casting time of a target.
Polish: Zwiększa Szybkość Ataku i Szybkość rzucania zaklęć celu.

English: Recovers HP for party members near you.
Polish: Odnawia PŻ członkom drużyny wokół ciebie.

English: Target enemy takes double damage in the next attack.
Polish: Cel otrzymuje podwójne obrażenia na następny atak.

English: Decreases the damage from physical & magical attacks on a target.
Polish: Zwiększa obronę fizyczną i magiczną celu.

English: Protects the target from incoming critical hits for a limited amount of time.
Polish: Chroni cel przed otrzymaniem ciosu krytycznego przez krótki czas.

English: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
Polish: Przebudza ukrytą siłę, zwiększając szybkość i siłę ataku członków drużyny wokół ciebie.

English: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
Polish: Stwarza na ziemi pole energii, które zadaje obrażenia co pewien czas wszystkim wrogom w zasięgu.

English: Deals five powerful blows to the enemy.
Fires a piercing beam at the target.
Polish: Przebija cel za pomocą promienia energii.

English: Strikes a heavy blow to the enemy that causes bleeding to the target.
Polish: Brutalny cios, wywołujący krwawienie u wroga.

English: Increases damage dealt to the target, but also increases targets attack.
Polish: Przeklina cel, zmniejszając jego obronę i zwiększając jego siłę ataku.

English: Strikes at nearby enemies with an outward shockwave.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie za pomocą duchowej Fali Uderzeniowej.

English: Fully concentrated strike. Always Consumes 100% MP.
Polish: Atak wymagający pełnej koncentracji - konsumuje 100% MP by zadać olbrzymie obrażenia. Im więcej MP pochłonie, tym większe obrażenia.

English: Strikes at the enemy with a ball of flame. Chance to reduce the targets healing capabilities.
Polish: Atakuje przeciwnika kulą ognia. Może zmniejszać leczenie u celu.

English: Damages the enemy continuously with a geyser of flame.
Polish: Otacza wroga gejzerem ognia, zadając ciągłe obrażenia.

English: Ranged, wind attack that moves the enemy.

Polish: Przenosi Cię na wybrane przez ciebie miejsce.

English: Blasts the enemy with a missile of ice. Chance to reduce the speed of the target.
Polish: Trafia wroga lodowym pociskiem. Szansa na obniżenie prędkości celu.

English: Damages the enemy with a ball of static. Chance to reduce the targets defense.
Polish: Zadaje przeciwnikowi obrażenia za pomocą Kuli Statycznej Energii. Może zmniejszać obronę celu.

English: Damages an enemy with a stone spike. Chance to stun the enemy.
Polish: Trafia przeciwnika ostrym kamieniem. Szansa na ogłuszenie.
Atakuje umysł wroga by zadać ból.

English: Damages an enemy with a fire ball.
Polish: Podpala wroga za pomocą kuli ognia. Cel będzie rozgrzany i chwilowo bardziej podatny na ataki wodne.

English: Ranged, wind attack. Reduces fire resistance of the target.
Polish: Tnie przeciwnika silnym wiatrem. Zmniejsza odporność na ogień.

English: A water attack that shoots multiple water orbs at your target.
Polish: Atakuje przeciwnika wielokrotnie za pomocą wybuchowych bąbelków.

English: Splashes the enemy with a water attack.
Polish: Wylewa na wroga olbrzymią ilość wody.

English: Damages the enemy with an electric ball
Damages the enemy with a small but fast lightning ball.
Polish: Wstrząsa cel potężnym wyładowaniem elektrycznym. Cel będzie wstrząśnięty i bardziej podatny na ataki Ziemią.

English: Damages the enemy with a giant stone.
Polish: Rzuca we wroga olbrzymim głazem. Cel będzie zmiażdżony i chwilowo bardziej podatny na ataki Wiatrem.

English: Damages the enemy with a mental blast and reduces their attack power.
Polish: Rozrywa umysł celu i obniża jego siłę ataku.

English: Damages the enemy with a ball of mental energy.
Polish: Wywołuje potężny wybuch psychicznej energii, który może ogłuszyć cel.

English: Creates a wall that pushes an enemy back and damages them & reduces their speed if they touch it.
Polish: Stwarza barierę która boleśnie odpycha wroga i zmniejsza jego szybkość.

English: Does damage to an enemy through the power of your mind.
Polish: Does damage to an enemy through the power of your mind.

English: Deals damage to an enemy equal to 1.75x the amount the enemy deals.
Polish: Zadaje wrogom 1,75x obrażeń jakie zadają tobie.

English: Damages surrounding enemies in a strong mental barrier. Small chance to stun targets.
Polish: Zadaje obrażenia wrogom wokół ciebie, ściskając ich psychiczną falą. Może ogłuszać wrogów.

English: Damages the enemies around you with a psychic blast.
Polish: Zadaje obrażenia wszystkim wrogom wokół wybranego celu za pomocą psychicznego pola.

English: Damages the enemy with a fire blast.
Increases the striking power of fire spells,
Damages the enemy with a bolt of lightning.
Polish: Wyładowuje olbrzymią ilość energii na cel.

English: Increases the striking power of electric spells.
Damage surrounding enemies with electricity. Magic Resistance of the enemies decreases.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkie cele wokół ciebie przeskakującym wyładowaniem. Obrona magiczna celu spadnie.

English: Damages an enemy with a stone spear.
Increases the striking power of earth spells.
Damages surrounding enemies area. Has a chance to lower the attack of the target.
Polish: Wstrząsa Ziemię by zadać obrażenia wszystkim wrogom wokół celu. Może obniżyć moc ataku u wroga.

English: Ranged attack that fires an ice projectile.
Polish: Ciska we wroga ostrymi odłamkami lodu.

English: Increases striking power of water spells.
Poisons all enemies in the surrounding area.
Polish: Zatruwa wszystkich wrogów wokół wybranego celu. Zatruty cel będzie otrzymywał ciągłe obrażenia.

English: To attack the enemy by generating a perfect vacuum.
Polish: Wysysa powietrze z płuc celu z olbrzymią siłą.

English: Increases the striking power of wind spells.
Damages surrounding enemies with a wind attack. The speed of the enemies will be reduced.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół celu potężnym wiatrem. Szybkość poruszania się wroga spadnie.

English: Damages surrounding enemies with a falling meteor.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie deszczem meteorów.

English: Damages surrounding enemies with electric blasts. Chance to reduce Critical Damage.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie wyładowaniami atmosferycznymi. Może obniżyć obrażenia od ciosów krytycznych.

English: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
Polish: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie za pomocą Burzy Piaskowej. Celność wrogów mocno spadnie.

English: Damages surrounding enemies with a snowstorm. Chance to Stun.
Polish: Wywołuje olbrzymią burzę śnieżną, która zada obrażenia wszystkim wrogom wokoło i może ich ogłuszyć.

English: Increases damage done with a Yo-yo.
Increases damage done with a Bow.
Become Invisible for a short time.
Polish: Na moment daje Ci pełną niewidzialność.

English: Increases walk speed for a short time
Polish: Zwiększa szybkość ruchu na krótki czas.

English: Slow shot that has a chance to deal double damage.
Polish: Wolny strzał z szansą na podwójne obrażenia.
Atakuje nogi wroga i spowalnia go.

English: A surprise attack that does more damage during Dark Illusion.
Polish: Niespodziewany atak, który z Mrocznej Iluzji zadaje większe obrażenia.

English: Creates a rain of arrows that does damage over time.
Polish: Sprowadza grad strzał, który zadaje obrażenia wszystkim wrogom wokół celu przez pewien czas.

English: A Yo-yo strike that can cause stun.
Polish: Uderzenie Yo-yo, które może spowodować ogłuszenie.

English: Fires arrows multiple times. Can reduce enemies Accuracy.
Polish: Strzela kilkukrotnie we wroga. Może obniżyć jego celność.

English: Steal penya from a target while in Dark Illusion. Attack from behind.
Polish: Okrada cel z Penya. Ten atak można wykonać tylko z Mrocznej Iluzji i od tyłu.

English: Execute an attack after the enemy does.
Polish: Powstrzymuje atak wroga i ogłusza go.

English: Strong Yo-yo blast. Chance to make the enemy lose health over time.
Polish: Potężne uderzenie Yo-Yo, które wywołuje krwawienie u celu.

English: Brings a target to you using Yo-yo.
Polish: Przyciąga cel do ciebie za pomocą Yo-yo.

English: Adds poison damage to your yo-yo and increases attack power.
Polish: Dodaje truciznę do Yo-Yo i zwiększa siłę ataku.

English: Adds blood damage to your yo-yo and increases attack power.
Polish: Dodaje szansę na krwawienie do Yo-Yo i zwiększa siłę ataku.

English: Adds the ability to drain HP to your yo-yo and increases attack power.
Polish: Dodaje szansę na kradzież HP do Yo-Yo i zwiększa siłę ataku.

English: Strikes the enemy multiple times with the Yo-Yo.
Strengthens the attack of a yo-yo by consuming penya.
Polish: Wzmacnia atak yo-yo poprzez zużycie penya.

English: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
Polish: Atak z zaskoczenia, gdy jesteś w Dark Illusion.

English: Increase Critical Hit for a limited time.
Polish: Zwiększa cios krytyczny na określony czas.

English: Slows an enemy down by shooting it with arrows covered in ice.
Polish: Spowalnia wroga, strzelając do niego strzałami pokrytymi lodem.

English: Gives the fire element to arrows and damages surrounding enemies.
Polish: Nadaje strzałom żywioł ognia i zadaje obrażenia pobliskim wrogom.

English: Shoots a deadly arrow full of poison at the target. Inflicts Poison.
Polish: Wystrzeliwuje w cel śmiertelną strzałę pełną trucizny. Nakłada truciznę.

English: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
Polish: Atakuje wroga i uniemożliwia mu rzucanie zaklęć.

English: Heightens the users senses with nature to increase Magic Defense & Bow Range.
Polish: Wzmacnia zmysły naturą, aby się zwiększyć Obronę Magiczna i Zasięg Łuku.

English: Fires three arrows at once. Stuns the target.
Polish: Wystrzeliwuje trzy strzały na raz. Ogłusza cel.

English: Blinded by the flash of light.
You are stunned and you cannot move.
Polish: Jesteś ogłuszony i nie możesz się ruszyć.

English: Attack just as an enemy attacks
Does damage to the enemy over a period of time
Polish: Podpala ziemię by zadawać ciągłe obrażenia wrogom w zasięgu.

English: Damages an enemy over a period of time and reduces their ability to heal.
Polish: Zadaje wrogowi obrażenia przez pewien czas i zmniejsza jego zdolność do leczenia.

English: You are stunned and cannot move.
Polish: You are stunned and cannot move.

English: Damages an enemy over a period of time and reduces their attack speed.
Polish: Zadaje wrogowi obrażenia przez pewien czas i zmniejsza jego szybkość ataku.
Tnie przeciwnika i kradnie jego siłę życiową z rany.

English: Damages an enemy over a period of time.
Polish: Damages an enemy over a period of time.

English: Decreases attack speed and increases the casting time.
Polish: Decreases attack speed and increases the casting time.

English: Increases striking power and attack speed.
Polish: Zwiększa siłę uderzenia i szybkość ataku.

English: Increases defense by wrapping the body in tree bark.
Polish: Zwiększa obronę poprzez owinięcie ciała korą drzewa.

English: Damages the target continuously over time.
Attacks the target with a shield. This attack has a chance to stun your enemy. Requires a shield.
Polish: Atakuje cel tarczą. Ten atak ma szansę na ogłuszenie przeciwnika. Wymaga tarczy.

English: Strong One-Handed attack that converts 5% of the damage you deal into FP stolen from the enemy.
Polish: Strong One-Handed attack that converts 5% of the damage you deal into FP stolen from the enemy.

English: Increases fighting cababilities at the cost of 1% of your maximum FP each strike. Damage will increase by 10% of your maximum FP. Requires a one-handed weapon.
Polish: Increases fighting cababilities at the cost of 1% of your maximum FP each strike. Damage will increase by 10% of your maximum FP. Requires a one-handed weapon.

English: Calls upon the moon to weaken the target. All damage done to the target while this de-buff is active is increased.
Polish: Calls upon the moon to weaken the target. All damage done to the target while this de-buff is active is increased.

English: Protects the monster from stun and rooting de-buffs.
Polish: Protects the monster from stun and rooting de-buffs.

English: The Dragon's grace awakens your attack power.
Polish: The Dragon's grace awakens your attack power.

English: The Lion's grace awakens your health.
Polish: The Lion's grace awakens your health.

English: The Tiger's grace awakens your critical damage.
Polish: The Tiger's grace awakens your critical damage.

English: The Fox's grace awakens your skill damage and casting speed.
Polish: The Fox's grace awakens your skill damage and casting speed.

English: The Rabbit's grace awakens your speed.
Polish: The Rabbit's grace awakens your speed.

English: The Griffin's grace awakens your incoming damage negation.
Polish: The Griffin's grace awakens your incoming damage negation.

English: The Unicorn's grace awakens your block rate.
Polish: The Unicorn's grace awakens your block rate.

English: The Angel's grace awakens your critical damage.
Polish: The Angel's grace awakens your critical damage.

English: The King Crab's grace awakes your block penetration.
Polish: The King Crab's grace awakes your block penetration.

English: A loud call that disrupts the target and forces them and nearby enemies to target you.
Polish: A loud call that disrupts the target and forces them and nearby enemies to target you.

English: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
Polish: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.

English: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
Polish: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.

English: The target will block the next incoming hit no matter what.
Polish: The target will block the next incoming hit no matter what.

English: Creates a gravity well at your cursor position that considerably slows enemies in the area.
Polish: Creates a gravity well at your cursor position that considerably slows enemies in the area.

English: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
Polish: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.

English: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
Polish: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.

English: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
Polish: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.

English: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
Polish: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.

English: A mysterious magic energy is preventing you from moving.
Polish: A mysterious magic energy is preventing you from moving.

English: Monsters have increased attack, and increased incoming damage.
Polish: Monsters have increased attack, and increased incoming damage.

English: All monsters explode on death, but have more drop rate.
Polish: All monsters explode on death, but have more drop rate.

English: Monsters reflect damage, but have more drop rate.
Polish: Monsters reflect damage, but have more drop rate.

English: Monsters regenerate a percentage of their health per second, but give more experience.
Polish: Monsters regenerate a percentage of their health per second, but give more experience.

English: Monsters have increased speed, but increased damage taken.
Polish: Monsters have increased speed, but increased damage taken.

English: Monsters have more critical chance, but give more experience.
Polish: Monsters have more critical chance, but give more experience.

English: Monsters have a chance to strike twice, but have more drop rate.
Polish: Monsters have a chance to strike twice, but have more drop rate.

English: Monsters have lifesteal, but increased incoming damage.
Polish: Monsters have lifesteal, but increased incoming damage.

English: Monsters attack faster, but have more drop rate.
Polish: Monsters attack faster, but have more drop rate.

English: This entity will not die until the target life link is below a certain HP threshold.
Polish: This entity will not die until the target life link is below a certain HP threshold.

English: Rapidly recovering health as a consequence of rage.
Polish: Rapidly recovering health as a consequence of rage.

English: Dungeon is covered in patches of ice that slow down. More drop rate.
Polish: Dungeon is covered in patches of ice that slow down. More drop rate.

English: A sticky web slows your movement.
Polish: A sticky web slows your movement.

English: A brutal strike has shattered your defenses. You take more damage than usual.
Polish: A brutal strike has shattered your defenses. You take more damage than usual.

English: Reduced the amount of healing received.
Polish: Reduced the amount of healing received.

English: The enemy has predicted your movements, and is resistant to your attacks.
Polish: The enemy has predicted your movements, and is resistant to your attacks.

English: All concentration has halted. Your ability to rouse magic has been reduced.
Polish: All concentration has halted. Your ability to rouse magic has been reduced.

English: There is an entity life linked to this one.
Polish: There is an entity life linked to this one.

English: A portion of the damage dealt to this monster is reflected back to you.
Polish: A portion of the damage dealt to this monster is reflected back to you.

English: The Siren draws you closer. Your pain is her pain.
Polish: The Siren draws you closer. Your pain is her pain.

English: You're seeing double. And feeling double..
Polish: You're seeing double. And feeling double..

English: This monster stays loyal to the pack.
Polish: This monster stays loyal to the pack.

English: A well of gravity considerably slows and damages you.
Polish: A well of gravity considerably slows and damages you.

English: This monster steals your life force, but takes 5% more damage.
Polish: This monster steals your life force, but takes 5% more damage.

English: The Demon Lord has cursed you with an overwhelming feeling of exhaustion.
Polish: The Demon Lord has cursed you with an overwhelming feeling of exhaustion.

English: This monster is feeling generous and will have an increased Drop & Exp bonus of 10%.
Polish: This monster is feeling generous and will have an increased Drop & Exp bonus of 10%.

English: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
Polish: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.

English: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
Polish: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.

English: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
Polish: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.

English: Donate G-Tokens to your guild and upgrade this enhancement's level!
Polish: Donate G-Tokens to your guild and upgrade this enhancement's level!

English: Crackling energy envelops the target. Increases the Drop Chance and Experience of this monster by 10%.
Polish: Crackling energy envelops the target. Increases the Drop Chance and Experience of this monster by 10%.

English: Sparks of power drain your strength. Run away to prevent it from spreading!
Polish: Sparks of power drain your strength. Run away to prevent it from spreading!
